HtmlTextEditor Module¶

class epyk.core.html.HtmlTextEditor.Cell(report, vals, language, width, height, htmlCode, options, profile)¶
action(icon, jsFncs, tooltip=None)¶

Add a bespoke action to the action panel

Parameters

  • icon – String. The font awesome icon

  • jsFncs – Array. The Javascript functions

  • tooltip – String. Text to be displayed when mouse is hover

Returns

run(jsFncs, icon='fas fa-play', tooltip=None)¶

Emtpy run button. This function will just add the icon on the actions panel.

Parameters

  • icon – String. The font awesome icon

  • jsFncs – Array. The Javascript functions

  • tooltip – String. Text to be displayed when mouse is hover

save(jsFncs, icon='fas fa-save', tooltip=None)¶

Emtpy save button. This function will just add the icon on the actions panel.

Parameters

  • icon – String. The font awesome icon

  • jsFncs – Array. The Javascript functions

  • tooltip – String. Text to be displayed when mouse is hover

class epyk.core.html.HtmlTextEditor.Code(report, vals, color, width, height, htmlCode, options, helper, profile)¶
property dom¶

Javascript Functions

Return all the Javascript functions defined for an HTML Component. Those functions will use plain javascript by default.

Returns

A Javascript Dom object

Return type

JsHtmlEditor.CodeMirror

property editorId¶

Return the Javascript variable of the bespoke

property js¶
Description:

A lot of CodeMirror features are only available through its API. Thus, you need to write code (or use addons) if you want to expose them to your users.

Related Pages:

https://codemirror.net/doc/manual.html#api

rtype

JsCodeMirror.CM

property options¶

Property to set all the possible object for a button

Return type

OptCodeMirror.OptionsCode

class epyk.core.html.HtmlTextEditor.Console(report, data, width, height, htmlCode, helper, options, profile)¶
property dom¶

Javascript Functions

Return all the Javascript functions defined for an HTML Component. Those functions will use plain javascript by default.

Returns

A Javascript Dom object

Return type

JsHtmlEditor.Console

property options¶

Property to set all the possible object for a button

Return type

OptText.OptionsConsole

class epyk.core.html.HtmlTextEditor.Tags(report, vals, title, icon, size, width, height, htmlCode, profile)¶
property val¶

Property to get the jquery value of the HTML object in a python HTML object. This method can be used in any jsFunction to get the value of a component in the browser. This method will only be used on the javascript side, so please do not consider it in your algorithm in Python

Returns

Javascript string with the function to get the current value of the component
